OBJECT.name: Description
OBJECT.FIELD: Test-Plex 300 is an oil based solution of six testosterone esters for IM injection including those of short, intermediate, and long half-lives. Serum testosterone will rapidly increase within 6 hours of IM administration and remain elevated for 7 – 10 days. Test-Plex 300 has both anabolic and androgenic effects. Test-Plex 300 will increase strength, muscle mass and improve libido.

OBJECT.name: Description
OBJECT.FIELD: Test-C 300 is an oil based solution of testosterone cypionate for IM injection designed to release testosterone slowly from the injection site. Testosterone serum concentrations remain elevated for 5-9 days after IM administration. Test-C 300 has both anabolic and androgenic effects. Testosterone supplementation has been demonstrated to increase strength and growth of new muscle tissue, frequently with increases in libido.

OBJECT.name: Description
OBJECT.FIELD: Test-E 300 is an oil based solution of testosterone enanthate for IM injection designed to release testosterone slowly from the injection site. Testosterone serum concentrations remain elevated for 5 – 8 days after IM administration. Test-E 300 has both anabolic and androgenic effects. Testosterone supplementation has been demonstrated to increase strength and growth of new muscle tissue, frequently with increases in libido.

OBJECT.name: Description
OBJECT.FIELD: Test-R 200 is an oil based solution of three testosterone esters: acetate, propionate, and phenylpropionate for IM injection designed to reach peak testosterone serum levels within 12 hours of IM administration and remain elevated for 3 to 4 days.
Test-R 200 has both anabolic and androgenic effects and will increase strength and growth of new muscle tissue, as well as increase libido.

OBJECT.name: Description
OBJECT.FIELD: Test-Prop 100 is an oil based solution of testosterone propionate for IM injection designed to reach peak testosterone serum levels within 12 hours of IM administration and remain elevated for 2 to 3 days. Test-Prop 100 has both anabolic and androgenic effects. Testosterone supplementation has been demonstrated to increase strength and growth of new muscle tissue, and increase libido.

OBJECT.name: Description
OBJECT.FIELD: Test-AQ 75 is an aqueous suspension of ultra-micronized un-esterified testosterone for IM administration; suitable when rapid increases in serum testosterone are required. Serum testosterone levels will rapidly increase within 1 hour of IM administration often peaking in less than 4 hours. Testosterone aqueous suspension produces significant short-term increases in strength, endurance, aggression and libido.

OBJECT.name: Description
OBJECT.FIELD: Nandro 300 is an injectable anabolic preparation containing both short-acting and long-acting nandrolone esters. The short-acting phenylpropionate ester provides a rapid increase in serum nandrolone levels followed by the long-acting decanoate ester with duration of action of 5 to 8 days. Nandro 300 accelerates muscle growth & strength and increases red blood cell production.

OBJECT.name: Description
OBJECT.FIELD: Bold 300 is an oily solution of boldenone undecylenate for IM injection. Boldenone serum levels will remain elevated for 5 to 9 days after administration. Boldenone is an anabolic steroid possessing anabolic properties with moderate androgenic activity. Bolde 300 is used where accelerated strength, muscular development, endurance and increased red blood cell production are indicated.

OBJECT.name: Description
OBJECT.FIELD: Drostan-P 100 is an oil based solution of Drostanolone Propionate for IM injection. Drostanolone is an anabolic steroid with significant anabolic and androgenic effects. The fast acting ester produces a rapid increase in serum levels which remain elevated for 2-3 days. Drostanolone promotes significant increases in strength, muscle anabolism, appetite and aggression, and has also been demonstrated to reduce body fat.

OBJECT.name: Description
OBJECT.FIELD: Tren-E 200 is an oil based solution of trenbolone enanthate for IM injection. Trenbolone is an anabolic steroid with significant anabolic and androgenic effects. The enanthate ester produces serum trenbolone levels which remain elevated for several days thereafter. Trenbolone promotes significant increases in strength, muscle anabolism, appetite and aggression, and has also been demonstrated to reduce body fat.

OBJECT.name: Description
OBJECT.FIELD: Tren-A 100 is an oil based solution of trenbolone acetate for IM injection. Trenbolone is an anabolic steroid with significant anabolic and androgenic effects. The fast acting ester produces a rapid increase in serum trenbolone levels which remain elevated for 3-4 days thereafter. Trenbolone promotes significant increases in strength, muscle anabolism, appetite and aggression, and has been demonstrated to reduce body fat.

OBJECT.name: Description
OBJECT.FIELD: Tren-AQ 50 is an aqueous suspension of ultra-micronized un-esterified trenbolone for IM administration; suitable only when extremely rapid increases in serum trenbolone are required. Tren-AQ 50 is a product with extreme anabolic and androgenic effects. Trenbolone promotes significant increases in strength, muscle anabolism, appetite and aggression, and reduce body fat.

OBJECT.name: Description
OBJECT.FIELD: Mag-Jack 250 is an unique blend containing 75mg of Trenbolone acetate, 75mg of Drostanolone propionate & 100mg of Testosterone propionate. This potent Androgenic / Anabolic blend promotes dramatic increases in strength, muscle anabolism, appetite, aggression and a reduction in body fat.

OBJECT.name: Description
OBJECT.FIELD: Stanol-AQ 100 is an aqueous, ultra-micronized suspension of the steroid stanozolol. Stanol-AQ 100 promotes anabolism through increased nitrogen retention and protein synthesis in muscle tissue. Stanol-AQ 100 is a strong anabolic substance with androgenic action. Stanozolol does not convert to estrogen and therefore does not produce typical estrogen mediated side effects such as water retention.

OBJECT.name: Description
OBJECT.FIELD: Primo 100 contains methenolone enanthate, a long-acting methenolone ester producing a rapid onset of serum methenolone with a continued duration of action of 5 to 8 days after IM injection. Primo 100 is moderately anabolic and androgenic. Methenolone is considered one of the safest anabolic agents, producing quality gains in muscle size and appearance.

OBJECT.name: Description
OBJECT.FIELD: Oxandro 10 is a well-tolerated 17-alpha alkylated anabolic steroid with very low hepatic toxicity. It promotes anabolism with very low incidence of adverse reactions. Oxandro 10 promotes improvements in strength and moderate increases in muscle mass, and will also enhance body fat reduction significantly in both the abdominal and visceral stores.

OBJECT.name: Description
OBJECT.FIELD: Turnibol 10 is an anabolic steroid for oral use. It promotes anabolism through androgen receptor activity and is strongly anabolic and moderately androgenic. Turnibol 10 produces potent increases in strength with quality increases in muscle mass. Turnibol 10 also will not produce many of the side effects such as water retention.

OBJECT.name: Description
OBJECT.FIELD: Stanol 10 is an oral androgen used to promote anabolism through increased nitrogen retention and protein synthesis in muscle tissue. Stanol 10 is a moderate anabolic substance with androgenic action. Stanozolol does not aromatize to estrogen and therefore does not produce typical estrogen mediated side effects such as water retention.

OBJECT.name: Description
OBJECT.FIELD: D Bol 10 (Methandienone) is an oral steroid that contains both strong andabolic & androgenic effects. Methandienone acts on the androgen receptor resulting in increased protein synthesis and nitrogen retention within muscle cells resulting in dramatic increases in strength and muscle mass.

OBJECT.name: Description
OBJECT.FIELD: Oxymeth 50 (Oxymetholone) is a very potent anabolic and androgenic drug. Oxymetholone promotes protein anabolism and rapid weight gain but has the potential for adverse reactions. Oxymetholone promotes rapid increases in strength, muscle mass, and growth of new red blood cells.

OBJECT.name: Description
OBJECT.FIELD: Proviron 25 is used to improve potency, fertility, physical and mental stamina. It is suitable for treatment of all conditions caused by deficient endogenous androgen formation while improving spermatogenesis. It is effective as an anti-aromatase in the body, preventing or slowing the conversion of androgens into estrogens.

OBJECT.name: Description
OBJECT.FIELD: Clen-40 combines the long-acting stimulant bronchodilator clenbuterol with caffeine (stimulant) and aspirin (adjuvant) for oral use. Clen-40 is a potent fat loss agent by agonizing beta-2-adrenergic receptors, resulting in increased metabolic activity.

OBJECT.name: Description
OBJECT.FIELD: Anastrol (Anastrazole) is an oral non-steroidal aromatase inhibitor (AI) used to decrease serum estradiol levels. Anastrol binds to the aromatase enzyme inhibiting conversion of testosterone to estrogens; reducing serum estradiol and estrone levels. By reducing the aromatization of testosterone to estrogens Anastrazole can be used to reduce water retention.

OBJECT.name: Description
OBJECT.FIELD: Magnum-Man is a potent combination of the two most effective ED medications: Tadalafil (Cialis) & Sildenafil (Viagra) micronized for maximum absorption. This sexual enhancer provides a fast onset of action that may last 24-36 hours.
